attributes.action: Give every student regardless of parents earnings EMA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All students should be given EMA who attend school or college after compulsary education. Depending on the parents earnings is a shody way of funding students as the parents of a high earning family may not be able to afford to give their child 30 pound a week.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition on the site: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EMA-4-EVERY1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
